scripts.publish:alpha: npm run version:alpha && npm run publish:alpha:only
scripts.publish:beta: npm run version:beta && npm run publish:beta:only
scripts.publish:release: npm run version:patch && npm run publish:release:only
scripts.publish:alpha:only: npm publish --tag alpha && git add package.json && git commit --squash -m 'Alpha release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')' && git tag -a v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') -m 'Alpha release' && git push --force && git push --tags
scripts.publish:beta:only: npm publish --tag beta && git add package.json && git commit --squash -m 'Beta release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')' && git tag -a v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') -m 'Beta release' && git push --force && git push --tags
scripts.publish:release:only: npm publish && git add package.json && git commit --squash -m 'Release v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')' && git tag -a v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') -m 'Release' && git push --force && git push --tags
